title: More Aggressive AFK Detection and Punishmen
body:
Hey Riot,

Can you please be more aggressive and proactive in dealing with afks. Pretty sick of it. Especially on weekends and holidays. An in-game reporting system allowing the game to short circuit would be nice. Or, better match making. Put offenders on the same team. Not much fun being against 5 afks, but better than having your whole game ruined because of one.

Ta!
